QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship Delinquency Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Amount Due based on amount due (ntd for non-monthly)
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select s.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0)) as SECONDASOFDATE, case when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE in (0,1,2) then -- Annually, Semi-annually, Quarterly case when day (rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE) < day (getdate()) then DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate())+ 1 else DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate()) end -- This get's the past due amount as of the 2nd of the current month when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT -- Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 6 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 6)/12) -- Bimonthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 7 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 24)/12) -- Semi-Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 8 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26)/12) -- Biweekly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 9 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, dateadd(day, 1, dateadd(month, datediff(month, 0, getdate()), 0))) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52)/12) -- Weekly end as MONTHSDELINQUENTONSECOND, case when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE in (0,1,2) then -- Annually, Semi-annually, Quarterly case when day (rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE) < day (getdate()) then DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate())+ 1 else DATEDIFF(m, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, getdate()) end -- This get's the past due amount as of the 2nd of the current month when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 3 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, getdate()) / ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT -- Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 6 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, getdate()) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 6)/12) -- Bimonthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 7 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, getdate()) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 24)/12) -- Semi-Monthly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 8 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, getdate()) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 26)/12) -- Biweekly when rsch.FREQUENCYCODE = 9 then dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFT_GETPASTDUEAMOUNT(ft.ID, getdate()) / ((ft.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT * 52)/12) -- Weekly end as MONTHSDELINQUENTTODAY from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.ID = s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on s.REVENUESPLITID = rsplit.ID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION ft on ft.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch on ft.id = rsch.id
where s.STATUSCODE = 1 -- active sponsorship and rsch.STATUSCODE = 0 -- active recurring gift
